reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress sparkles as they walk and appreciate its well-made construction with nice sequin work.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL, Comfortable, Flattering
items.body: I wore this to the Taylor Swift Eras tour and got SO many compliments! It was a last minute purchase that exceeded all expectations in quality, comfort, beauty and it was super flattering! I wore it with a nude colored bra, but if you want to wear a bra I'd suggest one with clear straps. I got away with it using my hair to cover it, and it really didn't show much anyways but the straps are thin (like a thicker version os a spaghetti strap). So just a suggestion. The little tassels on the dress are so much fun when you walk or dance. I felt like a flapper from the 20s. Taylor Swift's version is really close to this one, so it was perfect, but I'd wear it even for a different type of party or event. Great value! Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Melanie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Abrasive; it looks better on a hanger
items.body: It was uncomfortable to wear because of the abrasive material. Read more
items.author: miso soup

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The life of the party
items.body: This was an excellent dress.It moves well and fits well and everyone loved it Read more
items.author: Tenesia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL DRESS
items.body: I ordered this dress for a party & was very excited to try it on once I received it so quickly. The quality is nice but the sizing is off. I ordered the recommended size (L), but it was quite big. I think a M or maybe even a S would fit. I'm returning & the only reason I'm not exchanging it is because of the fringe in the shoulder area. It's a bit itchy & uncomfortable on the skin. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a nadine merabi dupe, picture looks waaaaay fuller than in person; color beautiful.
items.body: So I have been stalking the Nadine Merabi beaded fringe dresses and thought I found a Dupe! THe style is comparable but the fringe is a thin strand of sequins and lays thin and flat when its not moving. the picture looks great for motion but it looks cheap when you are standing still because its not full. Straps were a little wide/ top was a bit big and fell off shoulders, rest of fit was perfect. Color gorgeous. IF I needed a one time costume on the fly that was inexpensive this would do it. But I wanted a cocktail dress for date night- this didn't fit that. And ok dress dress but not for what I was wanting or the way the picture portrays it. Shoulda known when it's a picture from an in motion shot! Read more
items.author: redsmith

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, but it's poorly made and has weird proportions!
items.body: I wanted to love this dress so badly but it just fit horribly. I got it to wear to a concert and knew I'd be miserable the whole time because the straps were too long and the chest area was too big. The lining is not attached to the outer fringe sheath and the weight of the fringe pulled on the neckline, causing the liner to stick out. I tried pinning the straps to see if it helped, but I still had to adjust the neckline everytime I moved. The color of the dress (purple), sparkles, and fringe are super cute, but it's just a poorly made dress with weird proportions. For reference, I'm 5'2" 125lbs and ordered the XS. If you're a petite person with a large chest, this would be perfect for you! Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Espinosa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sizing is way off
items.body: Really pretty dress and nicely made but the sizing is way off. Ordered an L and it fits like an XXL. I would order at least one size down; maybe two Read more
items.author: Kimmieflies

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars size down
items.body: Bought this for Halloween, tried it on and absolutely loved it! Size down with this product if you are 5'2" and weight 120lbs. It is not as grey as the picture suggests, more silver than anything. Read more
items.author: Haley

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B-gold, B-white2, B-black, B-silvergrey, B-purple, B-green, B-pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
